article_title: Opioid Abuse Propels Record US Deaths From Overdose
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: opioid, abuse, propels, record, us, deaths, overdose, cdc

og.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Friday that drug overdoses have hit a record high in the United States.
